entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022
